commit.message:
Refactor execution of lsof to provide more debugging information.
The raw lsof output is retained and printed to the log on a failure.
A couple of intermittent failures have reported too many or too few pipes.
Additional lsof information can help identify the extra pipes.

Some test platforms do not have `lsof` installed, if not available,
the tests are skipped.
Remove extra -Xint test run, its purpose is unknown.

Refactored invocation of `lsof` to not use pipes for I/O, using files instead.
It removes the possibility of side effects that might affect the checking of pipe usage.

8291986: ProcessBuilder.redirectErrorStream(true) leaves error stream available
Added test to check pipe creation when spawning with and without `redirectErrorStream`.
Rewrote extraction of pipes to use `lsof` available on Mac and Linux.
Converted test to JUnit.
